Text: this is a piece of crap, its choppy as hell
I was not even able to watch this movie due to bad  quality... Some parts with just  color noise.
Now let's see... a 500MB avi file with DVD quality. Anyone who believes this is stupid. :)
Its not that its choppy, it is extremely blocky. The special effect you call 'choppy' is that this is 12 fps. Thats CPL.
dvd quality my ass. this file sucks, i couldn't even get through the first 15 minutes without the the screen turnig pink and green and the sound skipping
